1.03.name: wordpress/connect-address
1.03.description:
Connect Address improves your customer's shopping experience by relieving address anxiety. Shoppers can easily request the correct shipping address from friends and associates via popular social media channels including Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+ as well as Email and SMS. The shipping address is auto-populated into the online checkout form.

WordPress E-Commerce Cart Integration

  • Easy to install WordPress plugin
  • Compatible with the most-popular Carts including WP e-Commerce,WooCommerce,eShop,Cart66
  • Supports Shortcodes
  • Just a Few Simple Steps to Setup and Activate

For more information visit http://connectaddress.com
